Conversion of days to months

Source: R/utils.R
day2month.Rd

Conversion of days to months

Usage

day2month(x)

Arguments

x

(numeric(1))
time in days.

Value

A numeric vector with the time in months.

Examples

x <- c(403, 248, 30, 86)
day2month(x)
#> [1] 13.2402464  8.1478439  0.9856263  2.8254620

On this page

tern is a part of the NEST and pharmaverse.
